articles.description: 'But I think it would have to be a Ronaldo that would accept that he wouldn't play every single week and there would be moments that he wouldn't play and I think that's the big thing.
articles.content:
Manchester United legend Gary Neville has claimed Cristiano Ronaldo should change his game or risk not starting every match next campaign.
